name: diester
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a chemical compound that contains two ester groups: the diester of malonic acid
More examplesFewer examplesThe diesters of H-phosphonic acid occupy a major position in organophosphorus chemistry.That's a formula for a diester.The newly synthesised glycohydrolases are transported by virtue of a single phosphate or two phosphates in diester linkage.
